document_data.caption: A map showing Manger in northern Gwynneth.
document_data.name: Manger
document_data.mainbody: '''Manger''' was a small isolated coastal town located on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Manger was located along the coast of the [[Strait of Oman]] in northern Gwynneth. The settlment was found along the eastern edge of the [[Codsbay Mire]] north of the [[Black Mountains]].
